name: Natours
description: Robust RESTful API with JWT, file uploads, emails, Stripe payments, Mapbox, route protection, roles, permissions, security, encryption, geospatial queries, pagination, filters, sorts and more. It also has a front-end created with Pug.

name: Sample Bucket
description: Front-end project. Fully featured e-commerce with user authentication, Google Sign-In, product categories, audio previews with playable drum pads, shopping cart and stock control.
